course1.title: IoT Revolution Kit - ELGYEM
course1.info: Here are the biggest enterprise technology acquisitions of 2021 sofar, in reverse chronological order.

couseStructure.title: IoT Revolution Kit - ELGYEM
couseStructure.info: Robotics is an interdisciplinary field that combines computer science, engineering, and other disciplines to design, develop, and use robots. These machines can perform tasks autonomously or with human guidance. Robotics has applications in various industries, such as manufacturing, healthcare, agriculture, and exploration. It continues to advance with innovations in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and sensor technologies, revolutionizing industries and transforming the way we live and work.

topics.title: IoT Revolution Kit - ELGYEM by REES52 Complete Introduction Tutorial (KT560)
Turn On/Off led via web Server using NodeMCU ESP8266-12E Board - IoT Based Project- ELGYEM
Make a Led Chaser Circuit using Leds interfacing with NodeMCU ESP8266-12e Wi-Fi board - ELGYEM
Make A IOT LDR Alarm Circuit Using LDR Module And NodeMCU ESP8266-12E Wi-Fi Module - ELGYEM
Make An IoT Temperature Level Indicator Using Led & DHT11 Module With ESP8266-12e Board - ELGYEM
Make A Tilt Switch Alarm Using Tilt Switch And Buzzer With NodeMCU ESP8266-12e Wi-Fi Board
An IoT soil moisture monitoring system using soil moisture sensor & NodeMCU ESP-12e Board THINGSPEAK
IoT project on Remotely control Led using MQTTbox Server client with ESP8266-12e Wi-Fi Board
Measure Temperature and Humidity using DHT11 module with Node MCU via Blynk Application - PART 31
Make A Gas Level Monitoring System Using MQ-2 Gas Sensor Module using THINGSPEAK IoT Software
Make An IoT Gas Level Control System Using MQ-2 Gas Module & Led With BLYNK NodeMCU ESP-12e Board
